data.title: National Film Board
data.meta_description: As a public film producer and distributor, the National Film Board of Canada (NFB) creates social-issue documentaries, auteur animation and interactive works that provide Canada and the world with a unique Canadian perspective.
data.text:
Produce or co-produce with the NFB

Work with us as a director and/or co-producer, apply for filmmaker assistance and explore projects currently underway.

Discover the complete NFB collection

Access the complete NFB collection, with information on over 13,000 titles.

Attend a public screening

Find all NFB events, along with screenings at festivals and theatres across the country.

Search stock footage

Search our vast collection of visual archives—from the beginnings of cinema to “born-digital” 4K.

Access the Media Space

Get news releases, press kits, and other media resources in our press room.

Learn more about NFB works

Discover more about NFB works and their talented creators.

Purchase or program NFB works

Watch our latest films and trailers in advance before making your choice.

Use the NFB’s education tools

Give your students learning experiences that foster creativity, critical thinking and global citizenship.
